text: “Ia damazir okavɨrɨziba, egha ia gumazir igharaziba tuavim men akakaghasa! Iavzika, ia bar ikuvigham! Ia kamaghɨn gumazibar sure gamua ghaze, ‘Gumazir manam guizɨn mɨkɨmsɨva, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn akakagh mɨkɨmtɨ, an araziba pura bizim. Egh gumazir kam guizɨn mɨkɨmsɨva, golɨn Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven itibar akakagh mɨkɨmtɨ, kar a guizbangɨra mɨgei, egha a mɨkemezir arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ, a damu.’
